intro: Aneilema gramineum, commonly known as the grassy aneilema, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many ornamental and medicinal plants. The plant is characterized by its tall, erect stems and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. Its leaves are typically lance-shaped and arranged alternately along the stem. Aneilema gramineum is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and delicate blooms.
